articles.description: The country has to focus on widening the export mix to include more complex products by embracing value addition and innovation. This will help India command premium pricing as an exporter.

articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Paytm layoffs: More employees across departments may face axe in annual review - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Paytm layoffs have already begun two weeks ago and come as Paytm's Payment Bank has been barred by RBI from conducting several businesses.
articles.content: Paytm layoffs: Paytm's parent company One 97 Communications will lay off more employees across departments in the annual performance review, it was reported. This comes as Paytm's Payment Bank has be… [+2149 chars]

articles.author: Hitesh Vyas, George Mathew
articles.title: There’s a need to be cautious in the market… there’s little bit of froth in low floating stock counters: Nilesh Shah - The Indian Express
articles.description: “Our valuations are undoubtedly above average but our profit-to-GDP ratio is also more than above average. It is not that there is a big bubble but the road definitely is downward sloping,” Shah says. Excerpts:

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Better supply and demand drive PV sales to new monthly record - The Economic Times
articles.description: Passenger vehicle sales in India reached a new high for February last month, according to data from Siam. Two-wheeler sales fell short of the pre-Covid February 2020 record. The industry expects the growth momentum to continue.
